content.raw: @azeey, FYI, I started integrating pull request #130 with this one on branch `levels_factory`. Entity creation and destruction seem to work fine, but there's a problem when entities are deleted, and then new ones created reusing the old entity ids. I'll keep looking into it next week, I think we can stop reusing entities now that they're not stored in a vector anymore.
content.html: @azeey, FYI, I started integrating pull request #130 with this one on branch levels_factory. Entity creation and destruction seem to work fine, but there's a problem when entities are deleted, and then new ones created reusing the old entity ids. I'll keep looking into it next week, I think we can stop reusing entities now that they're not stored in a vector anymore.
